sentences.sContent: He should reconsider his decision to resign.
sentences.sCn: 他应该重新考虑辞职的决定。

sentences.sContent: We want you to come. Please reconsider.
sentences.sCn: 我们希望你来，请你重新考虑一下。

trans.tranCn: 重新考虑， 重新审议
trans.tranOther: to think again about something in order to decide if you should change your opinion or do something different
